title: Rust Server Rules
content: Please read and understand the rules before playing on our Rust server. Breaking any of these rules will result in a punishment.

title: Solo / Duo / Trio
content: This is a solo, duo, trio server. You may not team with more than 3 people. This includes alliances, raiding, roaming, etc. You may not swap out players to get around this rule. If you are caught teaming with more than 3 people, you will be banned.

title: Trading
content: You can trade with other players, but only in safezones. You may not trade outside of safezones otherwise it may be considered teaming.

title: Griefing
content: No griefing bases with tool cupboards, watch towers, etc...

title: Offline Raiding
content:
Offline raiding is allowed but discouraged. Offline raiding kills servers, don't be that guy. Grow a pair and online somebody, it will be fun for both teams.

If you lose loot or boom, it is easy to get back as it's a modded server.

If we receive multiple complaints about your team offline raiding, we will demolish your base and allow players to scoop up your loot.

title: Xim / Cronus / Zen Usage
content: Using a Xim, Cronus, or Zen is not allowed. If you are caught using one, you will be banned. If you suspect somebody using one, you will need to create a ticket via discord and send evidence. Using the in-game report feature does not give us the evidence we need, so your report will be ignored.
